clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.NullArg.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.NullArg
Check for null pointers being passed as arguments to C string functions.
The
clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.NullArg
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-unix.cstring.NullArg.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
